news.title: Trump says he will try to get back territory for Ukraine in talks with Putin
news.summary: The US president says talks with Putin on Friday will be a "feel-out meeting" aimed at urging Russia to end the war in Ukraine.

news.title: UN condemns targeted Israeli attack that killed five Al Jazeera journalists
news.summary: Israel says it targeted correspondent Anas al-Sharif, accusing him of leading a Hamas cell, which he had denied. Israel provided little evidence for the claim.

news.title: Who was Anas al-Sharif, famous Gaza journalist killed by Israel?
news.summary: Sharif was killed when Israel targeted a tent used by media in northern Gaza, alongside six others, Al Jazeera said.

news.title: No plans to change passenger rules for new young drivers a 'major oversight', AA says
news.summary: Government plans to overhaul driving laws do not include graduated licences for new drivers, despite calls for their introduction.

news.title: Three children arrested on suspicion of murder of man in Kent
news.summary: A 16-year-old girl and two boys, aged 14 and 15, are in police custody after an incident on Sunday.

news.title: Harry and Meghan sign new multi-year Netflix deal
news.summary: It's a looser arrangement than their previous deal - and comes ahead of a second series of Meghan's cookery show being screened later this month.

news.title: Perseid meteor shower: When, where and how to catch a glimpse
news.summary: The Perseids are considered the best meteor shower of the year

news.title: Amber health alerts as heatwave temperatures set to hit 34C
news.summary: Temperatures are expected to peak on Tuesday as heat health alerts are issued for the whole of England.

news.title: Explosion at Pennsylvania steel plant leaves dozens injured
news.summary: A rescue operation was underway for people trapped under rubble, while a cause for the explosion has not been confirmed.

news.title: UK's biggest toy shop chain The Entertainer handed to staff
news.summary: The toy retailer's 1,900 workers will get a share of profits and a say in how the business is run.
